## Data Flows
1. Start with *FHIR-based data pipelines* to standardize and support any digital intervention requiring analytics

2. Preprocess *'raw' FHIR data* into flattened **patient timeline table**

3. Define metric on top of **patient timeline table**

4. Using the International Patient Summary (IPS) as data model
